{{hero.name}} {{hero.alias}}

import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component, Inject, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Heroes } from '../classes/Heroes'; @Component({ selector: 'app-heroes', templateUrl: './heroes.component.html', styleUrls: ['./heroes.component.css'] }) export class HeroesComponent implements OnInit { public heroes: Heroes[] = []; constructor(http: HttpClient, @Inject('BASE_URL') baseUrl: string) { http.get(baseUrl + 'weatherforecast').subscribe(result => { this.heroes = result; }); } ngOnInit() { } }
